song.title: Grace to Grace
song.lyrics:
[1] .D A Bm G If love endured that ancient cross .D A Bm G How precious is my Saviour’s blood .D A Bm G The beauty of heaven wrapped in my shame .D A Bm The image of love upon death’s frame
[P1] .G (Dm) A If having my heart was worth the pain .G (Dm) A D/F# What joy could You see beyond the grave .G (Dm) A If love found my soul worth dying for
[C] . D A Bm7 How wonderful, how glorious . G D A Bm7 My Saviour’s scars, victorious . F#m7 Gmaj7 A Bm7 My chains are gone, my debt is paid . G D A G From death to life and grace to grace --- [2] If heaven now owns that vacant tomb How great is the hope that lives in You The passion that tore through hell like a rose The promise that rolled back death and its stone
[P2] If freedom is worth the life You raised Oh where is my sin, where is my shame If love paid it all to have my heart
[Inst] .G A Bm7 G D A
[B] .G A When I see that cross, I see freedom .Bm7 G When I see that grave, I’ll see Jesus .D A And from death to life, I will sing Your praise .A D/F# In the wonder of Your grace
[T] .G A Bm7 How my soul will sing Your praise . G D In the wonder of Your grace . A How my soul will sing Your praise
